item.title: New Elden Ring Update Makes the DLC Easier
item.description:
Highlights

  • Elden Ring's new update makes the DLC easier overall for players, addressing the challenging gameplay of Shadow of the Erdtree.
  • Scadutree Fragments help players deal more damage and withstand attacks, essential for completing the expansion.
  • After the update, the first half of the max Scadutree Fragments will provide a bigger boost, as will the final one.

FromSoftware has released a brand-new update for Elden Ring that should make the DLC slightly easier, especially in its early stages. Elden Ring 's Shadow of the Erdtree DLC has been released to widespread critical acclaim, but it has ruffled the feathers of even some of the most diehard Soulslike fans. While Elden Ring and the genre itself has a reputation for extreme difficulty, it seems many have been put off by just how challenging Shadow of the Erdtree is.

Shadow of the Erdtree has proven to be extremely difficult, to the point where some have started review bombing the game on Steam to voice their frustrations. There are those who feel as though Shadow of the Erdtree is simply too hard, especially compared to the base game, though there are others who appreciate the added challenge.

Perhaps in response to fan complaints about Shadow of the Erdtree 's difficulty, a new update has been released for the open world game that looks to address its balance. Update 1.12.2 is available for Elden Ring fans to download right now. It increases the amount of attack output and damage negation for the first half of the maximum amount of Blessing enhancements when players utilize Shadow Realm Blessings like Scadutree Fragments and Revered Spirit Ashes, though the second half will be more gradual. Furthermore, the attack output and damage negation for the final level of Blessing enhancements "has been slightly increased."

The long and short of it is that after downloading the update, Elden Ring players will have an easier time with the early parts of the DLC, as well as the expansion's final moments. So, those that feel like they've hit a brick wall with Elden Ring 's Divine Beast Dancing Lion boss may have an easier time winning that brutal fight, while those stuck on the final battle should also have a somewhat easier time. Of course, this all depends on whether Elden Ring players are actually collecting and using Scadutree Fragments.

Publisher Bandai Namco actually had to release a message reminding Elden Ring players to use their Scadutree Fragments, as it became clear that many were simply not utilizing them properly. Scadutree Fragments are a new collectible item that players can find by exploring the DLC. When used at a Site of Grace, they make it so players deal more damage and are capable of withstanding more incoming damage. Scadutree Fragments are essential for most people that want to complete the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, and as of the new update, they should give players an even more significant advantage.

In the patch notes for the new Elden Ring update, Bandai Namco also confirmed a bug where raytracing is automatically enabled when players on PC load saved data from previous game versions. This is what's been causing Shadow of the Erdtree 's framerate problems for some players, and those individuals are encouraged to turn raytracing off. The patch notes conclude by confirming that more Elden Ring updates are on the way that will fix bugs and make "other balance adjustments," though what those adjustments will consist of remains to be seen.

Elden Ring Update 1.12.2 Patch Notes

Attack and damage negation curve scaling of the Shadow Realm Blessings has been revised.

  • The attack and damage negation has been increased for the first half of the maximum amount of Blessing enhancements , and the second half will now be more gradual.
  • The attack and damage negation granted by the final level of Blessing enhancements has been slightly increased.

The calibration update can be applied by logging into the multiplayer server.

If the Calibration Ver. listed at the bottom right of the title menu is not "1.12.2", then select LOGIN and apply the latest regulations before enjoying the game.

About graphics settings (PC version only)

We have confirmed a bug where the raytracing settings are automatically enabled if you have previously loaded saved data from previous game versions.

If your framerate is unstable, please check in the 'SYSTEM' > 'Graphics Settings' > 'Raytracing Quality' settings from the title menu or in-game menu to check if it has been unintentionally set to 'ON'. Once set to 'OFF', Ray Tracing will no longer be automatically enabled.

Other balance adjustments as well as bug fixes are also planned for a future patch.

item.title: Every Major Video Game Release Coming Soon For PS5 And PS4
item.description:
Quick Links

  • PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In June 2024
  • PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In July 2024
  • PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In August 2024
  • PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In September 2024
  • PS5 2024 Games With Post-September Releases Or No Exact Date
  • Major Upcoming PS5 Games With No Release Year
  • Rumored PS5 & PS4 Games

2023 kept PlayStation owners busy. The year produced Resident Evil 4 (remake), Diablo 4 , Street Fighter 6 , Final Fantasy 16 , and Marvel's Spider-Man 2 , just to mention a few major releases. And, 2024 is mostly trying to do the same. The PlayStation 5 library is consistently expanding, and the best is presumably yet to come for Sony's current console. In the meantime, the PlayStation 4 continues to receive love with cross-generation titles, so people who have yet to upgrade still have plenty to look forward to.

Which upcoming PS5 games will soon hit store shelves around the world? Which 2024 PS5 games will set the world alight? The upcoming calendar lists every notable PS5 and PS4 project, along with their North American release date if that information has been announced.

Updated on June 26, 2024: Over the last week, the upcoming PS5 games were added to the scheduler: RPG Maker WITH, The Smurfs: Dreams, Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven, Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake, Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics, Metal Slug Attack Reloaded, Looney Tunes: Wacky World of Sports, MIO: Memories in Orbit, Just Dance 2025 Edition, Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero, Fairy Tail 2, Payday 3: Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue, Last Night of Winter, PowerWash Simulator: Alice's Adventure Special Pack, Fate Seeker 2, Harvest Days, Sword & Fairy Inn 2, Asphalt Legends Unite, Eden Genesis, Pepper Grinder, Let's School, Fabledom, Battle Spirits CrossOver, Beyond Good & Evil - 20th Anniversary Edition.

PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In June 2024

Destiny 2, Elden Ring & More

June 2024 is the month of expansions, with Destiny 2 , Elden Ring , and The Elder Scrolls Online all dropping new content. Each of these titles could headline a month on its own, so the fact their expansions are debuting so close is unusual. The Final Shape brought to an end Destiny 2 's story, and while Bungie's shooter has not always hit home runs, the conclusion has landed quite well. Shadow of the Erdtree came out to a standing ovation, much like the base game received in 2022. Expansive, challenging, and filled with new ideas, this follow-up represents Elden Ring at its best.

Moving away from expansions, June 2024 has plenty to offer as well. Killer Klowns From Outer Space and Still Wakes The Deep are interesting, even if the former did not garner a positive reception. The latter was received well. Meanwhile, June 14 saw the release of three ports that should entertain JRPG fans, particularly Shin Megami Tensei 5: Vengeance . Slime Rancher 2 will be making its full debut after a fairly long spell in early access. V Rising has also made its PlayStation debut. Ubisoft also randomly announced and released an anniversary edition of Beyond Good & Evil .

  • June 3 : Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons (PS5, PS4)
  • June 4 : Destiny 2: The Final Shape (PS5, PS4)

PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In July 2024

Frostpunk, Final Fantasy, & More

Final Fantasy 14 opted to wait until July to release its expansion, with Dawntrail starting the month on a high note. The MMORPG has been fantastic for a long time, and there is nothing to indicate that a misstep is on the horizon. Otherwise, July 2024 is slowly shaping up to be a strong month, with Bleak Faith: Forsaken , Frostpunk 2 , Earth Defense Force 6 , and The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak all being major (albeit niche) releases in their own right. Smite 2 will also be launching towards the end of the month, and it could very well prove to be among the year's most notable online multiplayer releases.

PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In August 2024

Black Myth, Steamworld, & More

Almost no games have been announced for August 2024; however, the few exceptions look pretty good. Black Myth: Wukong has been gathering steam for quite a while by this point, and the action RPG could be one of the year's strongest newcomers. Dustborn looks set to be a fun character-driven genre-blender. Core Keeper 's full debut is scheduled for this month as well, and the game has enjoyed a successful run in early access. EA's Madden NFL 25 will launch halfway through August.

Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft have confirmed that Star Wars Outlaws will launch at the end of August 2024. Set after the events of The Empire Strikes Back , the open-world game will tell a single-player story revolving around Kay Vess and Nix, as they try to pull off a major heist.

PS5 & PS4 Games Coming Out In September 2024

Astro Bot, Space Marine 2, & More

It is still way too early to predict which games will headline September 2024, but Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2 will almost certainly be among them as long as the project is not delayed. A sequel to Relic Entertainment's well-liked 2011 hack-and-slash game, the sequel looks set to be a great evolution from its predecessor.

While the definition of niche, Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 should be a decent co-op option. Funko Fusion could be a lot of fun as well, with the licensed game seemingly taking inspiration from Lego . Finally, Sony has announced Astro Bot , a 3D platformer sequel to Astro's Playroom .

PS5 2024 Games With Post-September Releases Or No Exact Date

Final Fantasy, Ys, & More

2024 currently offers endless possibilities, and there is a chance that the year's best game has yet to be announced entirely. That said, the year's catalog is slowly starting to take shape, and there are an array of projects that are tentatively expected to drop within 2024 but have yet to reveal release dates. Blue Protocol and Ys 10: Nordics are fairly safe bets for 2024 PS5 games , although that could change at a moment's notice.

Major Upcoming PS5 Games With No Release Year

Wolverine, Death Stranding, & More

As games spend years in development, plenty of projects are known to be in the works but have yet to announce anything resembling a release year. Death Stranding 2 , Assassin's Creed Infinity , and Beyond Good and Evil 2 are some of the biggest games in the works, all of which will attract plenty of attention once they debut. Most of these titles are presumably a few years away.

Rumored PS5 & PS4 Games

Rumors should always be taken with a grain of salt; that said, speculating about what unrevealed titles are secretly in development for the PS5 can be a lot of fun. With the PS5 in full swing, rumors have started making the rounds as people begin to speculate on what games they would love to see make an appearance on the console. Could these releases take the form of long-overdue sequels? Much needed remakes? Or could there be some new IP in the works that will become the new GTA?

item.title: Deepwoken: Best Races Tier List
item.description:
Deepwoken invites players to create unique characters. And the further you progress, the more different abilities you can get. However, some bonuses become available during character creation. And, of course, we are talking about Races. Each of them has unique Talent Cards and Attribute bonuses, although some are more useful than others.

Therefore, in this Tier List, we have ranked all the Deepwoken Races from best to least helpful. The right Race can make your progression a lot easier, as well as make your late-game build even stronger. But its re-roll is quite expensive.

Deepwoken Race Tier List

As we said, each Race in Deepwoken has unique bonuses. Players automatically get one of the 12 available Races when creating a character. It is important to note that in Deepwoken , special Races can only be obtained directly from the developers, so we do not rank them in our Tier List.

Race Tier Drop Rate
Vesperian S Tier 6.7%
Felinor S Tier 8.9%
Capra S Tier 2.2%
Adret S Tier 17.8%
Tiran A Tier 2.2%
Ganymede A Tier 2.2%
Gremor A Tier 13.3%
Khan B Tier 8.9%
Chrysid B Tier 4.4%
Canor B Tier 15.6%
Celtor C Tier 17.8%
Etrean C Tier 17.8%

In addition to bonuses, each Race has a certain drop rate, which makes them difficult to obtain. Plus, each reroll will cost you 150 Robux. Note that this feature is only available during character creation; after that, you will no longer be able to reroll the Race. Fortunately, during each reroll, you have the choice to get a new Race or keep the one you had before. For your convenience, we recommend using our Deepwoken best Races Tier List.

Best Deepwoken Races

Of course, for each player, different Races will be the best. This directly depends on what gaming style and build you prefer. But several Races in Deepwoken are worth your attention, as they are too good to miss:

  • Vesperian - This Race initially has natural armor, which reduces damage taken by 5%. It also grants +2 Willpower and +3 Fortitude.
  • Felinor - Thanks to the Nightchild talent, you significantly increase your agility and Stealth. It grants +2 Charisma and +3 Agility.
  • Capra - Besides the fact that this Race is the rarest in Deepwoken , it has several versions of talent. Three of them are the Mark of Nemit, the Mark of Jurik, and the Mark of Ku. And each of them will help you buff both yourself and your allies. In addition to this Capra, players receive +2 Willpower and +3 Intelligence.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong and Blasphemous 2 May Be in the Same Boat
item.description:
Despite its notoriously long development cycle, Hollow Knight: Silksong is still highly anticipated. There may not be any release date in sight, but there are still plans to release Silksong when it's finally ready. With its predecessor being one of the most successful indie releases in the past decade, Silksong has a lot to live up to, but it also has the same problem to face as another indie hit.

Blasphemous 2 may not be as much of a mainstream success as Hollow Knight , but it and its predecessor are fantastic indie titles with beautiful imagery and a fascinating world, giving both franchises common ground. Although Blasphemous 2 has the benefit of being released, once Silksong launches, the two titles are going to meet a fork in the road when it comes to the continuation of their respective franchises.

Silksong and Blasphemous 2 Have a Choice to Make With the Future of Their Franchises

Silksong 's developer, Team Cherry, and Blasphemous 2 's developer, The Game Kitchen, now have a huge decision to make about the next move. The main question lies in whether both studios should continue with third installments or if these developers should introduce a new IP to their rosters. Silksong and Blasphemous 2 hold the future of their franchises at the moment, and that's sure to be a daunting yet thrilling position.

Blasphemous 2 is at a Crossroads

Following its fantastic first installment, Blasphemous 2 launched to overwhelmingly positive reviews, bringing an even stronger Metroidvania experience to gamers. Blasphemous 2 is a great balance of horror and action, and it's understandable how many players could be left wanting more. The Game Kitchen has now established itself as a highly capable developer, so there is a huge choice to make about what game it wants to produce next.

On the one hand, it would be fantastic to see a third Blasphemous chapter brought to life, but on the other hand, it would be intriguing to see The Game Kitchen take a swing at an all-new story. Blasphemous is a stand-out franchise in the Metroidvania genre, which would be sad to see end. However, The Game Kitchen could potentially have something even more unique up its sleeve.

What Silksong's Development Woes Could Mean For the Franchise

Silksong and Blasphemous 2 have the same choice to make but for different reasons. Blasphemous 2 could continue its franchise right now, but Silksong' s long development could dictate Team Cherry's next move. At this rate, a third Hollow Knight game would be at least a generous five years away after Silksong . That means it's up to Team Cherry to decide whether it wants to pursue a simpler IP that could be developed quicker or invest fully in a Silksong follow-up, regardless of how long or ambitious that development phase would turn out to be.

Silksong' s absence from recent industry showcases is disappointing, but there is still the chance of a long-awaited update at this year's Game Awards.

When it comes to Hollow Knight 's franchise, Silksong 's extended production has become the biggest talking point about the game. Delays and lack of updates aside, Team Cherry has a lot of weight on its shoulders for just a three-person development team, so it's important to remember the hard work being put into the game. Crafting a follow-up to such a beloved game like Hollow Knight is no easy task, but the team is hopefully considering what moves to make next when Silksong makes its eventual debut.

Both games are some of the best indie releases of this generation, and they both deserve to live on. Still, it also may be the better choice for Team Cherry and The Game Kitchen to go back to the drawing board for something fresh.

item.title: How To Get Rain Of Fire Incantation In Shadow Of The Erdtree
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Rain Of Fire Spell Overview & Stat Requirements
  • Where To Find Rain Of Fire Location

Incantations in Elden Ring are the primary source of damage for all Faith-build users. The sheer amount of Incantations in the game allows players to choose any that fits their playstyle. With the recent launch of the new DLC, a lot of new areas have been added to the game, including new Sorceries and Incantations.

Rain of Fire is one of the weaker Incantations added into the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion, with each of the fire that drops deals little to no damage. Despite this, the Spell can still be useful in PvP to provide support and poke at the enemies from afar. The guide below includes the details on the location of the Incantation and which builds can make it more viable.

Rain Of Fire Spell Overview & Stat Requirements

Incantation of Salza, sage of the Fire Knights. Salza's disdain for barbarism never waned, even as he burned more villages and scorched more land than any other.

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , Rain Of Fire is a new Incantation . Casting this Incantation allows the user to channel and bring down rain of Messmer fire, which persists for a short period. The spell has very low damage output but this can be further increased by using the Fire Knight's Seal to cast it and equipping the Fire Knight Armor and Messmer's Helm .

The Incantation costs 27 FP to cast and can charged for greater potency. To equip it, you must have 1 Memory Slots available.

Summons a cloud of flame overhead that rains fire for a short time. Charging increases potency.

Rain Of Fire Stat Requirements

STR

DEX

INT

FAITH

ARC

0

0

0

52

0

Where To Find Rain Of Fire Location

To get the Rain of Fire in Shadow of the Erdtree , you must reach Shadow Keep in Scadu Altus. From the Main Keep Gate, head straight and fight the Golden Hippopotamus and head left afterward to reach the first floor. From here, you can head left to reach the Specimen Storage area, where you can find another Site of Grace.

From the West Rampart Grace, head towards the small door on the right side and go through it to find yourself on a giant bridge that connects Shadow Keep to the next main area. Cross it, collecting any items that you want to. At the end of the bride, you will find a Fire Knight casting an Incantation at you as you get in his line of sight. Approach the enemy and deal with him to acquire Salza's Hood and the Rain of Fire Incantation.
